DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Determine objective response rate , survival time , quality life patient leptomeningeal metastasis solid tumor lymphoma treat oral temozolomide . - Determine adverse event related regimen patient population . - Measure temozolomide concentration CSF serum correlate appropriate pharmacodynamic parameter ( e.g. , response ) patient . OUTLINE : Patients receive oral temozolomide daily 6 week . Courses repeat every 10 week absence unacceptable toxicity disease progression . Patients complete response ( CR ) receive 2 additional course achieve CR . Patients CR except residual radiographic abnormality persist unchanged 2 full course continue 4 course past best response . Quality life assess baseline , weekly first 4 week therapy , monthly thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 14-24 patient accrue study .
